articles.description: JUSTIN Trudeau has sparked confusion after opting to wear a face mask when he met Sir Keir Starmer during his UK visit but not while visiting the Queen.

articles.author: Monica Greep
articles.title: Life and Death in the Warehouse viewers urge 'anyone who shops online' to watch 'harrowing drama - Daily Mail
articles.description: Life And Death In The Warehouse, which aired on BBC Three last night, is based on real stories from warehouse workers who are 'constantly surveilled and bullied to keep their pick-rates up'
articles.content:
BBC viewers have urged 'anyone who shops online' to watch a harrowing new drama based on the real-life accounts of warehouse workers.

articles.author: Sonia Horon
articles.title: Steve Jobs' daughter Eve Jobs, 23, announces her modeling contract with DNA Model Management - Daily Mail
articles.description: Steve Jobs' daughter Eve is expanding her modeling career by joining DNA Model Management. She announced the news in a moody Polaroid-style photo posted to Instagram on Monday.
articles.content:
Steve Jobs daughter Eve is expanding her modeling career by joining DNA Model Management.
